neighbors.name: Steven C. Pendleton
neighbors.claims: Steven C. Pendleton is a contributor to the Moorefield Examiner and a representative of the 'Concerned Citizens of Old Fields' ([Moorefield Examiner](https://moorefieldexaminer.s3.amazonaws.com/Moorefield+Examiner+11-18-20.pdf)). He has actively opposed large-scale agricultural development, specifically a poultry complex in Old Fields, citing concerns about property values, health, and water quality ([Moorefield Examiner](https://moorefieldexaminer.s3.amazonaws.com/Moorefield+Examiner+8-26-20.pdf)). Pendleton has challenged the Hardy County Planning Commission regarding transparency and adherence to Open Meeting Laws ([Moorefield Examiner](https://moorefieldexaminer.s3.amazonaws.com/Moorefield+Examiner+4_14_21.pdf)). He has publicly stated, 'If my property value drops, who wants to buy it? That's a very personal concern to me' ([Moorefield Examiner](https://moorefieldexaminer.s3.amazonaws.com/Moorefield+Examiner+8-26-20.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Leader of citizens group; media contributor

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage early with high transparency; anticipate scrutiny regarding zoning compliance and property value impacts. Demonstrate strict adherence to open meeting regulations.
